review: I am so happy with this product that after buying the first one, I bought two more for my bouzouki and for my octave mandolin.
Very good stand especially for the price. It is not incredibly stable, but it is enough stable unless your microphone is super heavy.
I could not expect a better violin stand. It is very robust, versatile, good looking and not very expensive. Highly recommended.
Quality is really outstanding for the price. Sound is clear and crisp. I get a lot of feedback, but I guess that it is not because of the microphone.
Good for the price, but  If you can spend a few dollars more, I would recommend the graph tech ones.
